body.name: Philips NeoPix Ultra 2TV, True Full HD projector with Android TV
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 1 hr 55 mins
features: Vivid Display: Up to 100" display in True Full HD 1080p, Rec709. Updated sealed light engine for better bright image and vivid colors
Smart: built-in Android TV dongle with all your favorite apps, Google Cast and more!
Image Corrections: place it where you wish! Automatic rotation and keystone, horizontal and vertical keystone, digital zoom and panel flip functions
Booming Sound: 2x15 watts with Surround and bass boost for maximum power, immerse yourself and even listen to your music
Super Silent: new cooling technology reducing by 25% the fan noise

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 3.8 3.8 out of 5 stars 88 ratings 3.8 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Easily project your content, anywhere life takes you. Featuring a unique sealed LED engine, the NeoPix Ultra 2TV projector is not only elegant, but has been tuned to deliver 75% more brightness and accurate colors. With Android TV, your favorite content is always front and center. Whether you’re looking for a new show on Netflix, Hulu or Disney+ to binge watch or just want to pick up where you left off, you get what you want, when you want it. Just ask the Google Assistant! Chromecast built-in lets you cast your favorite entertainment and apps from your phone, tablet or laptop right to your TV or speakers. Place it wherever you wish! Vertical/Horizontal keystone and digital zoom corrections help eliminate crooked and distorted images for a perfectly proportioned picture even if the device is not in front of the wall. The booming stereo speakers synced with our DSP will provide a super sound and clear bass for a total cinematic immersion.

Whether you’re looking for a new show on Netflix, Hulu or Disney+ to binge watch or just want to pick up where you left off, you get what you want, when you want it. Just ask the Google Assistant! Chromecast built-in lets you cast your favorite entertainment and apps from your phone, tablet or laptop right to your TV or speakers. Place it wherever you wish! Vertical/Horizontal keystone and digital zoom corrections help eliminate crooked and distorted images for a perfectly proportioned picture even if the device is not in front of the wall. The booming stereo speakers synced with our DSP will provide a super sound and clear bass for a total cinematic immersion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Highly underrated, excellent projector
reviews.reviewText: There are many discrepancies in other reviews, some are misleading. Let me explain. This is an excellent projector, it triumphs Nebula (Anker) projectors. I absolutely do not understand why this is a not a best seller. First of all, this does have keystone (vertical and horizontal) corrections. Some other reviews that say otherwise are wrong. If you want tilt correction, use a tripod. I use it next to my bed and use both keystone corrections. Next, this has google TV built-in. Not many projectors have this. This reduces a lot of burden, it is super fast, you have access to google play store right away. The light is really bright, I had to reduce the brightness very often to get it work for me. This product also doesn’t come with California proposition warning, which means you get a quality product that’s not made from cheap cancer causing substances (especially not using any dangerous chemicals for the bulb). This does not have battery- I specifically don’t want to have battery and pay for it.This Phillips projector is equivalent to a $600 nebula projector for the features it has. I once again don’t understand why this isn’t the best selling projector. Just buy this if you’re reading my review till this point.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: 4 meses de uso y bien, funciona muy bien

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Philips NeoPix Ultra 2TV: no recibido despues de un mes, por eso las 3 estres.
reviews.reviewText: Review: En los últimos meses, he probado 7 proyectores, ya que nunca los había utilizado para ver TV o cine en casa. De estos, solo puedo recomendar dos, mientras que los otros no los recomendaría. Les daré una calificación del 1 al 5 según mi criterio.Proyectores recomendados:---Proyector 7 | VIZONY - Calificación 4.5 ***** FHD 1080P Projector 4K Support: Precio: $200 + $66.46 de impuestos de envío.Ventajas:1. Tiene un buen brillo, diría que alrededor de 800 a 900 ANSI, por lo que se puede ver en ambientes con luz moderada.2. No genera mucho ruido, menos de 27dB (bajo nivel de ruido, esto es realmente bueno).3. Contraste de 20000:1, mejora la profundidad en los colores negros, mejor que el REDEER.4. Buena calidad de sonido, mejor que la del REDEER.5. Resolución FULL HD.6. Tiene un buen diseño y se ve más elegante, incluso el control remoto.7. Ofrece modos de audio para futbol, cine o estándar.8. Electrónico funcional se puede enfocar desde el control.9. El Zoom máximo del 100% de la pantalla abarca toda la pared, alrededor de 130 pulgadas a una distancia de 3.6 metros. Excelente zoom, mejor que el del REDEER.Desventajas:1. No soporta 4K cuando se cambia en TV Stick (Roku).2. No tiene enfoque automático.3. No cuenta con apagado automático por inactividad.4. No se puede apagar ni encender desde TV Stick (Roku).5. Carece de modos de imagen para futbol y cine.---Proyector 6 | REDEER - Calificación 5 ***** [Enfoque automático] 4K: Precio: $200 + envío gratuito.Ventajas:1. Tiene un buen brillo, alrededor de 900 ANSI, por lo que se puede ver en ambientes con luz moderada.2. Soporta 4K para TV Stick (Roku) - El VIZONY no lo soporta.3. Contraste de 15000:1.4. Electrónico funcional se puede enfocar desde el control.5. Enfoque automático funcional - El VIZONY no lo tiene.6. Altavoces con calidad aceptable, aunque el audio del VIZONY es mejor.7. Corrección Keystone 4D/4P excelente.8. Apagado automático por inactividad y apagado desde el Rokup cuando no hay actividad.9. Se puede apagar desde Rokup.10. Se puede encender desde TV Stick (control opcional home).11. Ofrece modos de imagen como Normal, cine, futbol y otros.12. El zoom máximo del 100% de la pantalla abarca toda la pared, alrededor de 100 pulgadas a una distancia de 3.6 metros. Buen zoom.Desventajas:1. Hace mucho ruido, alrededor de 33dB a menos de 36 dB, un nivel de ruido alto que puede ser molesto.2. No tiene modos de audio para futbol, cine o estándar.---Otros proyectores no recomendados:Philips NeoPix Ultra 2TV: No puedo dar una calificación y mi opinión sobre este proyector, ya que está pendiente de envío hace un mes.Proyector 5 | Marca: GooDee, Mini proyector con WiFi y Bluetooth: No recomendaría este proyector, porque la calidad de la imagen es muy deficiente. Se realizó una devolución.Proyector 4 | Marca: DIPIKPRJ: Tampoco recomendaría este proyector, ya que es grande, pesado y de mala calidad. Se realizó una devolución.Proyector 3 | ULTIMEA Proyector 4K y HDR 10: Aunque tiene un buen brillo de imagen, hace mucho ruido, la pantalla no es nítida y no es lo suficientemente brillante. Se realizó una devolución.Proyector 2 | CiBest proyector 4K compatible con Android TV 10.0 5G: A pesar de su nitidez, solo se puede ver en ambientes totalmente oscuros. La ventaja es que viene con Android TV y no es necesario comprar un TV Stick.Proyector 1 | Calificación 3 *** - YABER C450 19000L 4K, hace mucho ruido y la pantalla no es nítida y falta que sea más brillante, solo sé bien en un ambiente oscuro. (Se hizo la devolución).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My unit had 2 black spots permenant on projected screen from.Auto keystone did not work.Manual keystone is gettin out of order after 20 min of use and need repeated ajustment.

This projector delivers satisfactory image quality when used in a completely dark room. However, even a slight amount of light hinders visibility. The sound quality is acceptable considering its price.Unfortunately, my unit has a problem with blurry images from the center point to the right bottom corner. Anything displayed in that area appears blurry, while the rest of the screen remains sharp. I have attempted to adjust the focus, but it has not resolved the issue.Additionally, I've encountered a crooked screen where the left side is noticeably lower than the right side. I've tried both auto and manual keystone adjustments, as well as repositioning the projector, but the problem persists.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 20, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Not a bad product overall, the main issue being that is it NOT 4-corner keystone correction, and therefore pretty challenging to have a straight, aligned projected image instead of distorted or bent. The best part is, the fan is way quieter than other model at that price point, loved it for that reason, very quiet and discreet (say 25-30db range approx), outstanding. Now, i guess the downside is, the projected image is way bleaker than that of other Noisy loud LED projectors, so maybe an arbitrage there. It has good built-in stereo speakers, which go very well with the remarkably low fan noise. Plus, it has built-in Android OS, like a smart TV, really good (outstanding again, so you dont necessarily need a TV firestick) compared to other cheap projectors. For me really, would have been 5 stars if it had proper 4-corner keystone correction. So was a return back to seller in my case unfortunately, couldn't make it work absent the 4-corner keystone correction.

One of the best bang for buck projector! A little wait from shipping from US but its worth it, great picture quality and the build in speaker is more than enough for any bedroom. Software is great as Android OS is more than what you will need. I'm using it in my bedroom for my son and he loves it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 24, 2022
reviews.reviewText: It looked promising right out the box, large and business like, and the fact that it connected to WiFi and had streaming apps on it was noteworthy. But, it had a bunch of things that were straight up disappointing.The menu was clunky, and to increase or decrease volume was a 3 step process.Colours were bleached even in a darkened room and the saturation increased.Focusing the centre of the screen made a significantly large portion of the outer screen out of focus.All in all, not really much better than my pocket projector which cost a third of the price.

reviews.reviewTitle: Buen sonido y bajo ruido del vetilador
reviews.reviewText: Buena calidad de construcción , poco ruido del ventilador , buen sonido y android tv. Hasta aquí todo bien...(Esta unidad era de 2ª mano como nuevo) quizás tuviera algún defecto ,no lo se...Lo mas importante que es la imagen , no me ha gustado, ya que es bastante apagada , no tiene la luminosidad suficiente ( no aparecen los lúmenes ansi en ningún sitio) la bombilla es eco (100w) de consumo, frente a otros proyectores que tienen lamparas de casi 300w, con la posibilidad de cambiar a un modo mas o menos luminoso...el contraste de 3000:1 es insuficiente... Y hay que verlo totalmente a oscuras, con luz no se ve bien. No conseguí enfocar todas las partes de la pantalla, poniéndolo justo enfrente. Estoy algo decepcionado...Al final , muy a mi pesar ,lo he devuelto y por un poco mas me he comprado un Epson EH-TW610 con 3000 lúmenes y contraste de 10000:1,que se ve de cine 🍿 con un fire tv.
